original: Drews, Paul Richard, köpman, Göteborg, f. 4/10/91 i Mölndal av verk-mäst. Richard D. o. Anna Börjesson. G. 1. 23 m. Elsa Svärd, d. 24; 2. 27 m. Barbro Afzelius, d. 43; 3. 46 m. Margit Carlbring. Barn: Birgit f. 24, sköterskeelev, Gbg, Jan 29, stud., Gbg, Hans 30, stud., Gbg. — Stud:res. t. USA o. flert. europ. länd. Anst. h. Claes Johansson & Co. Väfveri A-B i Gbg und, många år, därefter i ag:-firma Lindelöf & Co., avd. f. råmaterial f. ind., övert. denna avd. und. firma Paul Drews 34. V. ordf. i Sv. hand:ag. fören. avd. f. v. Sv:e.
translated: Drews, Paul Richard, merchant, Gothenburg, b. 4/10/91 in Mölndal to mechanic Richard D. and Anna Börjesson. Married 1st to Elsa Svärd in 1923, she passed away in 1924; married 2nd to Barbro Afzelius in 1927, she passed away in 1943; married 3rd to Margit Carlbring in 1946. Children: Birgit b. 1924, nursing student in Gothenburg, Jan b. 1929, student in Gothenburg, Hans b. 1930, student in Gothenburg. Studied abroad in the USA and several European countries. Employed by Claes Johansson & Co. Väfveri A-B in Gothenburg for many years, then by the trading firm Lindelöf & Co. in the raw materials department for the industry, took over this department under the firm Paul Drews in 1934. Vice chairman of the Swedish Trading Association, West Sweden division.
